attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A new DNA sequence model called AlphaGenome has been introduced to enhance regulatory variant-effect predictions and improve understanding of genome functions, now accessible via API.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Gemini Robotics has launched an on-device AI model designed for local robotic systems, offering general-purpose dexterity and the ability to adapt quickly to various tasks.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The AI Hype Index has been established to clarify the reality versus the hype surrounding AI technologies, providing an overview of the current state of the industry.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Chinese venture capital firm HSG has created Xbench, a dynamic set of AI benchmarks aimed at improving the assessment of AI model reasoning capabilities amidst growing concerns about performance evaluations.
